Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the Filmfare Awards and Konkona Sen Sharma?
Options:
A. The Filmfare Awards are a type of award presented at a ceremony.
B. Konkona Sen Sharma won the Best Supporting Actress award at the Filmfare Awards.
C. Konkona Sen Sharma was nominated for Best Supporting Actress at multiple award shows.
D. The Filmfare Awards are only for Best Supporting Actress.
Answer: A) The Filmfare Awards are a type of award presented at a ceremony., B) Konkona Sen Sharma won the Best Supporting Actress award at the Filmfare Awards., C) Konkona Sen Sharma was nominated for Best Supporting Actress at multiple award shows.

Question: Which awards was Konkona Sen Sharma associated with in relation to her acting career?
Options:
A. Filmfare Awards
B. Zee Cine Awards
C. Best Actor in a Supporting Role - Female
D. All of the above
Answer: A) Filmfare Awards, B) Zee Cine Awards, C) Best Actor in a Supporting Role - Female
